featured.text: Foggers, or bug bombs, should really be a measure of last resort.
The passengers ______ escaped death when a bomb exploded in the subway station, killing sixty people.
When you use a bug bomb, a chemical mixture rains down on your counters, furniture, floors, and walls, leaving behind oily and toxic substances.

other.text: Many people who are troubled by skin rashes caused by bug bites use “foggers,” or “bug bombs,” to get rid of the annoying crawlers in their homes.
Second, once a bug bomb is used, every surface in your home will be covered with the toxic pesticide.
First of all, the gases used in bug bombs are highly flammable and thus pose a serious risk of fire or explosion if the product is not used properly.

definition.zh_def: 一種爆炸裝置，通常用於軍事或恐怖活動。
definition.en_def: An explosive device used typically in military or terrorist activities.
definition.example: The soldiers were trained to defuse a bomb safely.
